note.p: Burial: Church of La Consolata, Turin, Italy

Career: Intendant of Nice (1703); Plenipotentiary of Savoy to the Diet of Boden (1704); Ambassador Extraordinary to the Kings of France, Russia, Poland, Austria and England; one of the signatories of the Treaty of Utrecht, which granted Sicily to the Kingdom of Savoy; Minister of State; First President of the Chamber; Secretary of State for the Interior (1713)
Notes: On PL for 1741 and not after.
